com.communote.plugins.mq.message.core.data.note

Class Note

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.plugins.mq.message.core.data.note.Note
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TemplateNote

    public class Note
extends Object
    POJO holding the data of a note.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/ *

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String CONTENT_TYPE_HTML
      constant for the content type that should be used if the content is HTML
      static String CONTENT_TYPE_PLAIN_TEXT
      constant for the content type that should be used if the content is plain text
      static String CONTENT_TYPE_UNKNOWN
      constant for the content type that should be used if the type of the content is not known and the server should try figure it out

    • Method Detail

      • getContent

        public String getContent()
        Returns:
        the content of the note

      • getContentType

        public String getContentType()
        Returns:
        the content type of the note. Supported values are 'HTML', 'PLAIN_TEXT' and 'UNKNOWN'.

      • getCreationDate

        public Date getCreationDate()
        Returns:
        the creation date of this note (use null and it will be the time of processing)

      • getParentNoteId

        public Long getParentNoteId()
        Returns:
        the ID of the parent note. If not null the note is created as a comment to the note with the given ID.

      • getProperties

        public StringProperty[] getProperties()
        Returns:
        the properties to add to the note, can be null

      • getTags

        public Tag[] getTags()
        Returns:
        the tags to be added to the note

      • getTopics

        public BaseTopic[] getTopics()
        Returns:
        the topics the note should be created in. The first topic is used as the target topic, the remaining as crosspost targets. There must be at least one topic.

      • getUnparsedTags

        public String getUnparsedTags()
        Returns:
        comma separated string of tag names which will be resolved to note tags

      • getUsersToNotify

        public BaseEntity[] getUsersToNotify()
        Returns:
        the users that should be notified, can be null

      • isActivity

        public boolean isActivity()
        Returns:
        whether the note is an activity. Returns false by default. Subclasses should override it if they support activities.

      • isDirectMessage

        public boolean isDirectMessage()
        Returns:
        whether the note is a direct message

      • isMentionDiscussionAuthors

        public boolean isMentionDiscussionAuthors()
        Returns:
        the mentionDiscussionAuthors

      • isMentionTopicAuthors

        public boolean isMentionTopicAuthors()
        Returns:
        the mentionTopicAuthors

      • isMentionTopicManagers

        public boolean isMentionTopicManagers()
        Returns:
        the mentionTopicManagers

      • isMentionTopicReaders

        public boolean isMentionTopicReaders()
        Returns:
        the mentionTopicReaders

      • setContent

        public void setContent(String content)
        Set the content of the note
        Parameters:
        content - the content to set

      • setContentType

        public void setContentType(String contentType)
        Set the content type of the note. Supported values are 'HTML', 'PLAIN_TEXT' and 'UNKNOWN'.
        Parameters:
        contentType - the content type to set

      • setCreationDate

        public void setCreationDate(Date creationDate)
        Parameters:
        creationDate - the creation date of this note (use null and it will be the time of processing)

      • setDirectMessage

        public void setDirectMessage(boolean directMessage)
        Set whether the note is a direct message
        Parameters:
        directMessage - true if the note is a direct message, false if not

        public void setMentionDiscussionAuthors(boolean mentionDiscussionAuthors)
        Parameters:
        mentionDiscussionAuthors - the mentionDiscussionAuthors to set

        Parameters:

      • setParentNoteId

        public void setParentNoteId(Long parentNoteId)
        Set the ID of a note this note should be created as a comment of.
        Parameters:
        parentNoteId - the ID of the parent note

      • setProperties

        public void setProperties(StringProperty[] properties)
        Set the properties which should be added to the note
        Parameters:

      • setTags

        public void setTags(Tag[] tags)
        Set the tags to be added to the note
        Parameters:
        tags - the tags of the note

      • setTopics

        public void setTopics(BaseTopic[] topics)
        Set the topics the note should be created in. The first topic is used as the target topic, the remaining as crosspost targets. There must be at least one topic.
        Parameters:
        topics - the topics

      • setUnparsedTags

        public void setUnparsedTags(String unparsedTags)
        Set a comma separated string of tag names which will be resolved to note tags
        Parameters:
        unparsedTags - the unparsed tags

        public void setUsersToNotify(BaseEntity[] usersToNotify)
        Set the users that should be notified about the note
        Parameters:
        usersToNotify - the users to notify
